sfrpg-modern-ui.settings.theme.label: Theme palette
sfrpg-modern-ui.settings.theme.hint: Choose which theme to use in your client, select -- disabled -- to use to system theme.
sfrpg-modern-ui.settings.blur_radius.hin: Adjust panels frosted glass effect strenght. ** Warning ** it may not work in some browsers, eg. Firefox. (default: 10)
